title: License Tracking: Monitoring AI Recognition of Credentials
article:
### Guide
### Why License Tracking Is Important
License tracking helps ensure assistants recognize your credentials consistently across all data sources.

### How to Track
- Record schema validation dates.
- Review AI citation reports quarterly.
- Compare assistant mentions to schema updates.

### Result
Strong license tracking maintains trust and catches visibility gaps early.
meta description: Maintain license tracking to ensure AIs continually verify your professional credentials.
